entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
